chooseWalletErgoPay.hintMarkDown:
Connect with ErgoPay.

browserWalletHintMarkDown:
Connect to a browser extension wallet to set your Ergo address.

[Find a dApp connector browser wallet](https://ergoplatform.org/en/get-erg/#Wallets)
invokeErgoPayHintMarkDown:
Complete the action with an ErgoPay compatible wallet.
